summary: An Ordinance submitting to the qualified electors of the City of Seattle at the general election to be held in said city on Tuesday the 3rd day of March, 1908, the question of ratifying the existing general indebtedness of the City of Ballard at the date of its annexation to the City of Seattle in the sum of approximately $65,000; and also the question of the issuance and sale of negotiable bonds of the City of Seattle in the amount of $65,000 to provide money for the repayment into the general fund of the City of Seattle of the money advanced from said fund to pay the said general existing indebtedness of the City of Ballard at the date of its annexation to the City of Seattle.
